Text:
FUCK DANA WHITE AND HIS BITCHIS
Dana is characterized by his love for profane laced tirades and his ambition of destroying anyone who doesn't go along with his ways. He single handedly annihilated many of his competitors such as EliteXC and Pride Fighting Championship, for example.

Framerate is 25 FPS, but it looks VERY jittery and not smooth at all..

There are only 2 "facebook" fights for this one, unlike the FX Prelims which has at least half a dozen.

V:2
A:6

Highly compressed audio but it's not terrible. The video is painful to watch; a stuttering, jittery mess. Pretty odd considering how large the file size is.
